attributes.action: Stop the consent age lowered to 10 years of age
attributes.background:
The consent age currently is 16 years of age but there is talks of it being changed to 10 years of age.
Let’s get this thrown out before it’s begun.
Please sign

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The age of consent to any form of sexual activity in the UK is already 16 for both men and women, the Government has not announced any plans to make changes to the age of consent, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
